text: Thiollierea pachyphylla is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to New Caledonia. ==References== * Jaffré, T. et al. 1998. Bikkia pachyphylla. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. pachyphylla Category:Endemic flora of New Caledonia Category:Conservation dependent plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Thiollierea pachyphylla
